title: Creamy Avocado Lime Smoothies
directions: Blend all ingredients in a blender until creamy. Taste and adjust sweetness to your liking. If the mixture is too thick, add more coconut milk as needed to blend. Garnish with chia seeds, if desired
ingredients: 2 cups packed fresh spinach (or 1½ cup chopped frozen spinach)
¾ cup light coconut milk (canned or from a carton)
3 tablespoons fresh lime juice, plus ½ teaspoon zest
2 scoops Aloha Vanilla Protein Powder, more as desired
1 teaspoon maple syrup, or sweetener of your choice
a sprinkle of chia seeds, optional, for garnish
